articles.author: Ash Parrish
articles.title: Everything revealed during the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct - The Verge
articles.description: Nintendo’s Switch 2 Direct presentation on April 2nd revealed the new console’s price, launch date, new games, and features like GameChat.
articles.content:
Its time! After an agonizing three-month wait, Nintendo finally revealed more details on the Switch 2 during its Direct on April 2nd at 9AM ET.
While Nintendo told us very little in the official rev… [+16522 chars]

articles.title: Everything New in the iOS 18.5 Beta - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple today provided developers with the first beta of an upcoming iOS 18.5 update for testing purposes. Work on iOS 18 is starting to wind down with...
articles.content: Apple today provided developers with the first beta of an upcoming iOS 18.5 update for testing purposes. Work on iOS 18 is starting to wind down with iOS 19 set to be introduced in a couple of months… [+1459 chars]
